meta.name: dc:Publisher
meta.content: Watch Tower Bible and Tract Society of Pennsylvania

level1.h1: Psalm 133 A Song of the Ascents. Of David.

p.span: Look! How good and how pleasant it isFor brothers to dwell together in unity!
2 It is like fine oil poured on the headThat runs down the beard,Aaron’s beard,And runs down onto the collar of his garments.
3 It is like the dew of HerʹmonThat descends on the mountains of Zion. That is where Jehovah decreed his blessing—Life everlasting.
